Package mdes.slick.sui.event

Contains classes for event handling with Sui components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ActionListener A listener to receive action events (such as button presses).
ChangeListener  
ControllerListener An interface to receive controller events.
KeyListener An interface to receive key events.
Listener A tagging interface which all SUI event listeners should extend.
MouseListener An interface to receive mouse events.
MouseWheelListener An interface to receive mouse wheel events.
 

Class Summary
ActionEvent An event that indicates a component-defined event has occurred.
ChangeEvent Indicates that a component/object state has changed.
ControllerAdapter A convenience class for ControllerListener which receives controller events.
ControllerEvent A controller event, such as button pressed or released.
EventObject The base class for SuiEvents.
KeyAdapter A convenience class for SuiKeyListeners which receives key events.
KeyEvent A keyboard event, such as key press or key release.
MouseAdapter A convenience class for MouseListener which receives mouse events.
MouseEvent A mouse event, including motion and press/release.
MouseWheelEvent A mouse wheel event which holds the amount the wheel has changed since the last event.
 

Package mdes.slick.sui.event Description

Contains classes for event handling with Sui components.
